title: Large-Scale Project-Based Blended Education for Strengthening Dental Hygiene Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational dental hygiene theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: A course focused on cultivating practical digital content creation and application skills for pre-service and in-service dental hygienists

learning_goals: Learners can develop digital educational modules (videos/infographics) reflecting real dental treatment scenarios

Learners strengthen instructional design competencies by incorporating Fink's Six Taxonomies of Significant Learning (foundational knowledge, application, integration, human dimension, caring, and learning how to learn)
Learners improve the field applicability of educational materials by at least 80% through peer feedback and expert review

resources: Digital content creation software (Canva, CapCut, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
